original_text: Dear friends, I am not writing you a new command but an old one, which you have had since the beginning. This old command is the message you have heard.
korean_text: 사랑하는 자들아 내가 새 계명을 너희에게 쓰는 것이 아니라 너희가 처음부터 가진 옛 계명이니 이 옛 계명은 너희가 들은 바 말씀이거니와

sentences.original_text: I am not writing you a new command
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 너희에게 새 계명을 쓰는 것이 아니라

sentences.original_text: which you have had since the beginning
is the message you have heard
